import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List view users"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/views/{viewId}/users"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the user share assignments for a view so you can see who has access and gather viewUserId values for updates or responses.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** - Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views), [GET /api/v1.0/assets/views](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-views), [GET /api/v1.0/users/views](/docs/api/users/list-user-views), or [GET /api/v1.0/views/for-sites](/docs/api/views/list-site-views).

**Workflow Example**
1. List views in the module and select a viewId.
2. [GET /api/v1.0/views/\{viewId\}/users](/docs/api/views/list-view-users) to retrieve share assignments.
3. Use viewUserId values with update/delete/response endpoints.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `viewId` (path).

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
